entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
